landing.invite.friend.desc: Come and experience our 3D creation tool now
landing.invite.friend.why.tips1: Rich 3D resource library, meeting various creative needs
landing.invite.friend.why.tips3.desc: Industry-leading creation experience, preferred by professional designers
landing.header.mobile.title: Link Menu
landing.title: Unleash Your Creativity with AI-Powered 3D Modeling
landing.subTitle: Transform your ideas into stunning 3D models with our cutting-edge AI technology. Simply describe your vision, and let our AI bring it to life with mesmerizing animations and a visually stunning background.
landing.productFeatures.title: Product Features
landing.productFeatures.subTitle: Meshivo 3D is a powerful AI-powered 3D generation platform, providing creators with fast and convenient tools
landing.productFeatures.feature1.title: AI Smart Generation
landing.productFeatures.feature1.subTitl: Based on advanced AI technology, simply describe with text to automatically generate high-quality 3D models. Supports multiple styles and types, turning creativity into reality quickly.
landing.productFeatures.feature2.title: Smart Materials
landing.productFeatures.feature2.subTitl: AI automatically matches the best materials and textures, generating realistic visual effects
landing.productFeatures.feature3.title: One-Click Optimization
landing.productFeatures.feature3.subTitl: AI intelligently optimizes model details, automatically fixing and beautifying generation results
landing.productFeatures.feature4.title: Style Customization
landing.productFeatures.feature4.subTitl: Supports multiple artistic styles, from realistic to cartoon, meeting different creative needs
landing.productFeatures.feature5.title: Easy Export
landing.productFeatures.feature5.subTitl: Supports multiple 3D format exports, compatible with mainstream modeling and rendering software
landing.creationCollection.title: Creation Collection
landing.creationCollection.subTitle: Discover and share 3D models from around the world
landing.userEvaluate1.title: Loved by Users
landing.userEvaluate1.subTitle: The software is very simple, people can't help but fall in love with it.
landing.userEvaluate2.title: Meshivo 3D makes 3D modeling incredibly simple!
landing.userEvaluate2.subTitle: Previously, we needed to spend a lot of time on modeling, rendering, and optimization. Now, with the help of Meshivo 3D, we can easily generate high-quality 3D models, greatly improving our creative efficiency.
landing.userEvaluate2.name: Alex Chen
landing.userEvaluate3.title: AI one-click 3D scene generation
landing.userEvaluate3.subTitle: Our design team needs to create various 3D scenes every day, and Meshivo 3D allows us to generate complex 3D environments with just one click, greatly reducing modeling time and making creative implementation more efficient.
landing.userEvaluate3.name: Emma Li
landing.userEvaluate4.title: Multi-format support, the ultimate tool for 3D creation!
landing.userEvaluate4.subTitle: As a game development studio, we have always faced the challenge of 3D model multi-platform adaptation. Meshivo 3D's multi-format export allows us to easily adapt to different platforms, significantly improving development efficiency.
landing.userEvaluate4.name: David Wang
landing.userEvaluate5.title: Creative Inspiration Library
landing.userEvaluate5.subTitle: We tried using Meshivo 3D's creative generation features to help us complete 3D design concepts, which greatly saved our conceptual design time and allowed ideas to come to life faster.
landing.userEvaluate5.name: Sophie Zhao
landing.userEvaluate6.title: Multi-style 3D generation
landing.userEvaluate6.subTitle: In the past, we needed multiple professional software to generate 3D models in different styles. Now, with Meshivo 3D's multi-style generation capabilities, creating 3D content in various styles is effortless.
landing.userEvaluate6.name: Jack Liu

faq.subTips2: We provide trial users with 500 Points per month. If you wish to access more services, we recommend purchasing a subscription plan.

onlineViewer.title: Free Online 3D Viewer
onlineViewer.description: Quick, free, simple, high-definition 3D model online viewing
onlineViewer.whyChoose.title: Why Choose Our Viewer?
onlineViewer.whyChoose.description: The fastest and most reliable way to view 3D models
onlineViewer.whyChoose.feature1.title: Instant Loading
onlineViewer.whyChoose.feature1.descript: Using advanced WebGL technology, supports fast loading and smooth preview of large 3D models
onlineViewer.whyChoose.feature2.title: 100% Safe
onlineViewer.whyChoose.feature2.descript: All files are processed locally, not uploaded to the server, ensuring your privacy and data security
onlineViewer.whyChoose.feature3.title: Supports All Main Formats
onlineViewer.whyChoose.feature3.descript: Supports GLB, FBX, OBJ, STL, DAE, etc. mainstream 3D file formats, high compatibility
onlineViewer.howToUse.title: How to Use
onlineViewer.howToUse.step1.title: Upload File
onlineViewer.howToUse.step1.description: Click the upload button to upload the 3D file to the upload area, supports multiple formats
onlineViewer.howToUse.step2.title: Start Viewing
onlineViewer.howToUse.step2.description: The system will automatically load and render your 3D model
onlineViewer.howToUse.step3.title: Interactive Operation
onlineViewer.howToUse.step3.description: Use mouse dragging, wheel zooming, and full-viewing to view the model
onlineViewer.faq.title: FAQ
onlineViewer.faq.answer1: GLB is the binary format of GLTF, which contains all information about the 3D model, material, and animation, is one of the most popular 3D file formats, widely used in Web, AR/VR, etc.
onlineViewer.faq.answer2: We support GLB, FBX, OBJ, STL, DAE, etc. mainstream 3D file formats, supports up to 100MB files. If you have other format needs, please contact us.
onlineViewer.faq.question3: Will the file be uploaded to the server?
onlineViewer.faq.answer3: No, all files are processed locally in your browser, we will not save any of your files, ensuring your privacy and data security.
onlineViewer.faq.answer4: Yes, our viewer fully supports mobile devices, including phones and tablets, you can view 3D models on any device.
onlineViewer.faq.answer5: Absolutely free! Our 3D model viewer is free for all users, no registration, no payment, and all functions can be used.
onlineViewer.faq.answer6: Yes, we support animation 3D models, you can play, pause, adjust playback speed, etc.
onlineViewer.faq.answer7: Currently, we focus on the online viewing function, and model export is not supported. If you need export functionality, we recommend using professional 3D modeling software.
onlineViewer.faq.answer8: If you encounter any problems during use, you can contact us through the contact information at the bottom of the page, and we will solve them as soon as possible.
fileConverter.title: 3D Model Format Converter
fileConverter.description: Support conversion between mainstream 3D model formats, including GLTF, GLB, FBX, OBJ, DAE, STL, PLY, etc.
fileConverter.whyChooseDescription: Professional, fast, and secure 3D model format conversion service
fileConverter.multiFormatSupportDescript: Supports GLTF, GLB, FBX, OBJ, DAE, STL, PLY, etc. mainstream 3D file formats, high compatibility
fileConverter.dataSecurityDescription: Local processing, files will not be uploaded to the server, protecting your privacy
fileConverter.qualityAssuranceDescriptio: Keep the geometric, material, and texture information of the original model
fileConverter.howToUseDescription: Three steps to convert 3D model formats
fileConverter.selectFormatDescription: Select input and output formats, supports conversion between multiple 3D formats
fileConverter.uploadFileDescription: Click to upload your 3D model file, the system will automatically detect the file format
fileConverter.downloadResultDescription: Download the converted file directly, keeping the original quality
fileConverter.faq.answer1: GLB is the binary format of GLTF, which contains all information about the 3D model, material, and animation, is one of the most popular 3D file formats, widely used in Web, AR/VR, etc.
fileConverter.faq.answer2: We support GLB, FBX, OBJ, STL, DAE, etc. mainstream 3D file formats, supports up to 100MB files. If you have other format needs, please contact us.
fileConverter.faq.question3: Will the file be uploaded to the server?
fileConverter.faq.answer3: No, all files are processed locally in your browser, we will not save any of your files, ensuring your privacy and data security.
fileConverter.faq.answer4: Yes, our viewer fully supports mobile devices, including phones and tablets, you can view 3D models on any device.
fileConverter.faq.answer5: Absolutely free! Our 3D model viewer is free for all users, no registration, no payment, and all functions can be used.
fileConverter.faq.answer6: Yes, we support animation 3D models, you can play, pause, adjust playback speed, etc.
fileConverter.faq.answer7: Currently, we focus on the online viewing function, and model export is not supported. If you need export functionality, we recommend using professional 3D modeling software.
modelCompression.title: 3D Model Compression Tool
modelCompression.description: Smart compression of 3D model files, reducing file size while maintaining visual quality
modelCompression.uploadDescription: Supports GLTF, GLB, OBJ, FBX, DAE format, maximum 100MB
modelCompression.whyChooseDescription: Professional, fast, and secure 3D model compression service
modelCompression.smartCompressionDescrip: AI-driven compression algorithm, maximizing file size reduction while maintaining visual quality
modelCompression.dataSecurityDescription: Local processing, files will not be uploaded to the server, protecting your privacy and data security
modelCompression.multiFormatSupportDescr: Supports GLTF, GLB, OBJ, FBX, DAE format
modelCompression.selectFormatDescription: Select input and output formats, supports compression between multiple 3D formats
modelCompression.uploadFileDescription: Click to upload your 3D model file, the system will automatically detect the file format
modelCompression.downloadResultDescripti: Download the compressed file directly, keeping the original quality
modelCompression.faq.answer1: No. Our compression algorithm is optimized to reduce file size while maintaining visual quality. You can choose different compression levels to balance file size and quality.
modelCompression.faq.answer2: Currently, we support GLTF, GLB, OBJ, FBX, DAE, etc. mainstream 3D model formats. More formats are being developed.
modelCompression.faq.answer3: The compression ratio depends on the complexity of the model and the compression level chosen. Generally, light compression can reduce 10-20%, medium compression can reduce 30-50%, and high compression can reduce 50-70% of the file size.
modelCompression.faq.question4: Will the file be uploaded to the server?
modelCompression.faq.answer4: No, all compression processing is done locally in your browser, we will not save any of your files, ensuring your privacy and data security.
